solution_line_template: Aunt Angela has a total of {nephews} + {nieces} = <<{nephews}+{nieces}={total_children}>>{total_children} nephews and nieces.
She gave each nephew or niece {total_jellybeans} / {total_children} = <<{total_jellybeans}/{total_children}={jellybeans_per_child}>>{jellybeans_per_child} jellybeans.
